pageContext.claim: “Oh, for Lima, you know, Lima, the army tank plan? Lima, right? You know I did that when I was here. They was gonna close that plant, and I heard, that I was President elect, so I had nothing to do for a little while. You know? I didn't know I was being spied on. So, I had nothing to do and I heard about this tank plant, and I had some friends, a lot of friends in Ohio.... So I said, 'No, I'm not gonna let this be closed.' And I stopped it. ...And we, uh, we didn't close it.”
pageContext.analysis: This story is a fantasy, Trump has steered more funding to this tank plant in Ohio, but it was never in danger of closing.
